website_summaries.verdict: CK pulls out the stops with a best-selling strapless bra, both functional and comfortable enough to be worn at work or for special occasions.
pros: Has a pretty sweetheart cut and comes in a variety of colors
Anti-slip silicone strips inside band keep bra in place, which users say work better than just about any other strapless
Also comes with extra adjustable straps
Unobtrusive even under thin shirts or dresses
cons: some users don't feel it's a true push-up bra

customer_reviews.title: CK best for pancake boobs
customer_reviews.text: Do you have shallow breasts with a wide base? Are your breasts "easty-westies" (a.k.a. tits in your pits)? CK is the only brand I have found that doesn't chop my breasts off at the side or gap so much in the cup that I could smuggle apples. I'm a fan. This bra in particular has grippy silicone so it's not going anywhere, even if you don't have much to hold it up. The adjustable straps are an extra perk.
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Order one size up
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying it runs a size small in the band. If you are used to Natori feathers, I’d say this runs similarly in cup size but still tighter in the band. I’m a 30dd and this fits like a 28dd- very very snug and can barely fasten the loosest hooks on the band and the cups are pretty shallow. That being said, this is still the best fitting strapless bra I’ve found in my size range. I’m pretty sure I can buy a band extender rather than search another 8 years looking for one that fits as close! Also, at $17, this is a freaking steal.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Those non-slip lines, made my skin breakout in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Those non-slip lines, made my skin breakout in a rash, it was not noted anywhere, that it can cause an allergic reaction to some skins. Might contain latex.
customer_reviews.author: R. W

customer_reviews.title: Ignore CK's size chart
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice bras but I appear to be between cup sizes, so ended up in a Maidenform strapless instead (they run about 1/2 cup size small, which works for me). A note on CK's size chart: according to it I should've been a 34A, which surprised me as I'm currently a 32C in all my other bras, including CK. Sometimes sizing can be weird with strapless, so I tried the 34A along with 34B, 32B & 32C, and the latter was the closest to fitting. So my advice is to ignore their chart, start with your regular bra size and go from there.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Never have to pull this up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to wear with my skinny-strapped dresses and camis, and it's perfect. When I wear it, it doesn't slip at all, and I've never had to pull it up like my other strapless bras. It's very snug, and it leaves red marks wear the band sits, but I don't mind. It gives my boobs a little bit of a lift as well which is a nice bonus. I listened to the other reviews that said it fits tight, but I didn't size up and it's perfect. I normally wear a 36A, and I ordered a 36A.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Howard

customer_reviews.title: Secure strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: I'm biased towards Calvin Klein bras in the first place, but I love how this bra stays for secure on my chest - because of a little rubber at the top of the bra. I'm 32A and it felt like the band was more of a 30 or 31 because I usually use the first set of hooks but on this bra I use the last pair. Maybe consider that if you normally use the back set of hooks. I got it in nude and it's a little darker than my skin tone, but it's the best nude strapless bra I've found so I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Order a band size up, and you’ll love it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a black strapless and had tried many, many of them, and hated them all. I ordered this first in my usual size, 32C. The band felt more like a 30. I decided to heed the others advise and reorder one band size up in it, a 34C. Voila! It’s relatively comfortable for a strapless and it has not slipped one bit, all day! This is a winner girls! Just make sure you do order one band size up! (I took off one star for the sizing issue.)
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: The item I received was counterfeit. The tag is made of a rough material. The stitching is of poor quality. There is over fabric on multiple places. The cups are deformed, and the fabric on the loose. The brand stiching on the straps are incorrect. The br has a HORRIBLE chemical stentch. Reporting seller to Amazon AND Calvin Klein WITH photographs. I want a full refund NOW.
customer_reviews.author: Junemarie

customer_reviews.title: If I hadn't worn, it I wouldn't have believed it were possible!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a strapless bra in over 7 years because of horrible experiences...just didn't know how far they'd come, I guess. I saw this was listed in the Top 10 on the internet...so I thought I'd give it a go....and I am thankful I did!!! Wow, it's got lift,it stays put, and it's comfortable!!!!!!!!! It's almost too good to be true. Now I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Nauer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate band sizing despite many reviews stating otherwise
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and followed them going up a size in the band... Big mistake! I really don’t think the band runs small at all. I exchanged for my normal sizing because even on the tightest setting it does not get tight enough. The cup size is pretty accurate, it is slightly big but if the band was tighter there would be no gaping whatsoever (I tested this theory by manually tightening the band with my hand and bending down at different angles). I liked the overall look
customer_reviews.author: Clumsyninja9

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - Band Sizing Is WAY OFF
customer_reviews.text: I am a very small, consistent size 32D usually. I own other CK bras in this size. I ordered the 32D and it fit like a 28D - I couldn't even get the bra hooked if I tried. I measured it against another new bra in the same size and it was significantly off. I ordered up to a 34D - the band is better, but the cup is a little too big. For $17 (and an occasion where I needed to wear it ASAP, honestly), it's workable and I'm keeping it. But I think you can find better because something is really off with this bra sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Left me with noticeable scars
customer_reviews.text: I thought this bra was great, other than being a little tight, which I know is to keep it from slipping. I really liked it, but when I took it off I realized that the strap had left me with blisters along both sides of my back. I’m a little shocked by how much damage this bra did to my skin. Please be careful if you are going to buy this product. I have very noticeable scarring now from just one use!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Stays up ! Not very padded. No push up
customer_reviews.text: So for the price I like this. It fits tighter than a regular bra but stays up so that’s perfect. It has light padding but no push up which is the only reason I don’t like it. If you are smaller chested and want push up this may not be for you. I think it will be ok under something structured that has shape though.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small and tight
customer_reviews.text: I've had many CK bras over the years and am always a 34C. ALWAYS. However, the 34C in this bra was extremely small and tight. The back was actually almost rolling even though I had it on the loosest clasp. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: Great strapless!!!!! I've never bought a bra online before. We've all been there before at the store, try on 6 different bras and none of them fit right. I recently bought a Calvin Klein bra and the fit was perfect, but I needed a strapless so I thought I would give it a try and if it didnt fit I could return it. Best choice I made this bra is great! It's true to size and best part it is so comfortable. It doesn't cut into your back like most strapless do. I am usually a 36b and bought a 36b. I came back and ordered 2 more different colors. Get this bra you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: I want to love this. I appreciate the extra tight band for ...
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this. I appreciate the extra tight band for support (it's not exactly true to size but wireless bras are often made tighter on purpose) BUT my beef with this bra is that the cups were just way too small. You need proper fitting cups in order to have support and having double or quadraboob is not cool in a dress.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: The only bras I wear
customer_reviews.text: I’m 4’11” 96lbs and I can’t wear bras with straps because they fall off all day long. I also don’t wear colored bras or fancy textured bras because I’m far too lazy to figure out appropriate undergarments for my outfits. I only wear strapless CK bras in 30C in black or nude and they are absolutely the best. They never Ever slide down. They have just enough padding to give shape without faking your measurement.
customer_reviews.author: LWynn

customer_reviews.title: Complete disappointment and disatiisfaction with product
customer_reviews.text: The fit and sizing of this product was so far off that I wouldn't even bother to reorder it in another size. I have worn this brand and style for years and never had a problem with fit and sizing before this purchase. The current manufacturer is either skimping on the fabric or completely erring inn the sizing
customer_reviews.author: Glenda S. Whatley

customer_reviews.title: Small Girls with larger busts will love this bra
customer_reviews.text: AS far as strapless bras go, this is a really good one. I feel supported and secure. Because of this bra I can finally wear clothes that require a strapless bra. Measure yourself and order based on size chart and you should be good on sizing. Great for small girls with larger busts like me.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer1991

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I was Measured at Nordstrom and told I’m a true 30 D. That’s what I ordered And it’s WAY too small. I meed To return it and I’m bummed Bc it seems like it would have been a nice bra otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stays in Place
customer_reviews.text: I typically struggle with strapless bras but NOT with this bra! This bra is very comfortable and it stays in place because it has the silicone lining around the back edges of the bra. The color is the perfect nude shade. I did have to exchange because I found that it ran small. I am typically a 30c and had to size up to a 30d.
customer_reviews.author: C Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Just Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I dont understand the rave reviews.... I always wear bras in 34B, i bought the first bra of this bras, in this size and I could barely clasp it in the back it was so tight and clearly too small. I thought... maybe its because it runs small the reviews did say that... So I bought a 36B... this one falls down, it does not stay in place, it is not flattering on me at all...
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Vernaza

customer_reviews.title: Definitely secure.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'0 and 105-110 lbs. I tried the 30 C and quickly realized a 32 C was needed to continue breathing. But when I did manage to hook it on, I knew it wasn't coming down so it was secure I can say that. I asked for an exchange but no word yet. Great bra I just needed a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Key

customer_reviews.title: I am a 34b..... I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a 34b.....I ordered this in my size but what I realized with strapless bras, especially this one, is that if you don't want it to pull you flat and give you that awkward uni-boob look, then I suggest going up in the cup size. My friend is the same size and me and let me borrow hers and when i asked what size it was she told me a 30d and was fitted for this bra at Nordstrom. Just a little helpful tip to ladies with smaller chest....hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: FashionLemonade

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not for really small chests.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 32 AA and this just about fit me. If I moved at an angle or twisted my body, I could feel some air pockets forming in between my chest and the cups. Wasn’t as snug as I had hope they would be on my breasts but the band held everything together. I didn’t have to pull this up. I wore it for a night out and forgot it was there.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Robles

customer_reviews.title: Yay for small chest bra that fits
customer_reviews.text: Im a 34" A and this was great. The material is super soft and smooth, it fits around without choking me but still serves as a push up even tho it is strapless. Love it. Only reason I gave 4 stars is because they never had them available in other colors besides shiny gold.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Coppola

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: So tight I can't breath. All of my bras are 34
customer_reviews.author: geysa

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stays in place
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfy strapless bra! Fits as expected. I ordered the same size as I usually wear and it’s perfect. Not too tight. Stays in place all day and flattering. It does come with straps but I haven’t used them. Nice to have the option though. I’d definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Cap

customer_reviews.title: Accurate fit IF you use the CK size chart
customer_reviews.text: This bra is a nice quality; I'm glad I took a chance on it! Very important: measure yourself and go by the Calvin Klein size chart that's shown on the item page. My typical bra size is 34B, but I am a 36C by their chart and that's what I ordered. Perfect fit. Very smooth fit, and probably the single most comfortable strapless I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: C Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size. I’m usually a 32C. My rib cage is 28” and bust 32”. I bought this bra in 32C and it was way to tight and the cup size wasnt big enough
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, super comfy, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I ADORE this bra. I’ve got small boobs and they’ve nursed 5 kiddos, and this bra does a great job of holding and shaping in a super comfy way. I originally bought it to wear with strapless shirts and dresses but it’s quickly become my go to bra because it fits so well, and with my shoulders free from straps and the perfect amount of support it’s more comfortable than not wearing a bra (as well as more comfortable than all my other bras!). I will definitely be buying this again at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Choy

customer_reviews.title: Hallelujah this strapless is the IT bra
customer_reviews.text: Finally the Mecca of strapless bras, comfortable and gives me nice shape under my clothes. I am a very small 36B, I don't fill the cup in most B bras but A is a bit too small. The fullness is at the bottom of my breast and this bra is just perfect the first one I have ever found
customer_reviews.author: Italia30

customer_reviews.title: Order One Band Size Up
customer_reviews.text: Cup size fits just right, but band size was shorter than normal. I ordered a 36B and I was able to close it on the hooks closest to the edge. I usually use the first set of hooks on the inside. When I compared it to another 36B, this bra was a little shorter. I think their 38B might be what other brands consider a 36B. I would recommend ordering one band size up.
customer_reviews.author: Sainte Germaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bra if you're looking for a nice shape and support.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking, well made bra. As suggested by other reviewers, I ordered a size up in the band (but not the cup), and it fit fine. Unfortunately, I need something with minimal-to-no padding to fit under a gown, and this doesn't fit the bill. The product description mentions minimal push up, but I think I need no push up at all. Although I can't use it for its intended purpose, I might just keep it because it's a nice bra.
customer_reviews.author: mothership

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place all day
customer_reviews.text: This bra stays on perfectly. It does not move at all throughout the day. It fits a little tighter than the typical size just to make sure you stay in place. It has a rubber liner type thing to prevent movement. It does come with removable straps!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Annell

customer_reviews.title: stays up even for us larger cup sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how well this stapless bra stayed up! I ordered this a few days before I left for a cruise in a cup size larger as everyone suggested (after reading all the reviews). I'm 5'4 weigh 116lbs and wear a 34D (I ordered a 34DD) it has the silicone around the inside of the band to help it stay up and that's what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The twins are nicely supported w/o slippage!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable, true-to-size, strapless bra. I wear a 30C size bra and it's nearly impossible to find that size in brick-and-mortar stores who seem to think 32" bands are the smallest women need. I'm delighted to see that Amazon carries 28" and 30" band sizes! This Calvin Klein bra fits wonderfully and comfortably without slipping. No gaps and no double breasts! My twins feel nicely supported in this bra.
customer_reviews.author: XiXi

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place and doesn’t flatten.
customer_reviews.text: Best strapless I’ve ever had. Never have to pull it up. Stays put really well and doesn’t flatten my already small breasts! And the sillouehette is flattering. I even used a bra extender (I have some muscular problems that make me extra sensitive to pressure) and it stayed on! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 32DD and feeling totally supported!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great bra. The best and most supportive strapless bra I have ever had. I am a 32DD so usually strapless bras are out of the question for me because i seriously needs support! The color is great, and completely blends in. It has stinky lining to help adhere to your skin when wearing which also helps it stay up!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Louise

customer_reviews.title: Rashes from the bra liner
customer_reviews.text: I used this bra several times. Every time I used it, I broke out with rashes on the right side of my body where the silicone liner touched my skin. I own several strapless bras and never had allergic reactions to any of them. To rule out the possibility that I just simply had allergy to the particular silicone that this bra used, I bought another one of these bras. I wore the new bra a couple of times but no rashes at all. Based on this experience, I have concluded that the first bra I bought must have some weird chemical in the silicone liner on the right side that caused the rashes. Not happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did not received the right bra!
customer_reviews.text: I did not received what I ordered! I order a Calvin Klein Bra and I received some Victoria's Secret knock-off bra. It is also huge and fits weird. Unfortunately I cannot longer return. I did not return before because of the pandemic restrictions in my city
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra ever
customer_reviews.text: Been searching a while for a good strapless bra that wasnt full coverage but still supportive with a bit of cleavage. And this is the best bra ever! Im a 36DD and its very flattering(no overly spaced out or cone boobs over here lol) and supportive and makes my pregnant boobs perky and cute. If i had to compare it to other brands, the support is Lane Bryant quality with Victoria’s secret cleavage so it is LITERALLY the best of both worlds. Once i wear this one out I’ll definitely be purchasing another one of these🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Miranda S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color, good fit. Top edge shows through Tops
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good. Comfortable. Color is great for wearing under sheer light tops, which is what I purchased it for. However, the top edge of the bra shows a bit through some of the tops. It doesn’t sit complete flush and smooth against my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll P. McCusker

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR FLAT CHESTED GIRLS
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I’m super flat chested and this actually stays up! The grips actually works. But it’s tighter so it will stay up. However you could size up if you wanted some extra breathing room.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Robertson

customer_reviews.title: loop that connects the strap to the band broke!!!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and supportive for 36 dd...right up until the loop that connects the strap to the band broke ~2 months after purchase. I know it's not a high-end bra but I still have Chantal and Simone Perele bras that I bought over a year ago so I'm expecting at least half that from a lower-priced product.
customer_reviews.author: BrandNewReviews

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh...
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Sizing is way off. I wear 34dd, ordered this size and half a boob wouldn't fit in the entire bra, let alone one cup. Bigger boob ladies, look elsewhere, Calvin has no time for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great supportive strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: This is the best strapless bra I've owned so far! I love the gel-like material around the base which keeps the bra up and in place. This worked great for my bridesmaid dress! I am flat-chested, 34A, and this helped boost my chest up a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: LGraham

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bras. I have bought them twice for my pregnancy.p over the past few months. I didn’t want to buy a ton of new bras since I was buying these specifically to my pregnancy. I love that they are strapless but they are great for everyday bras too. I highly recommend ladies!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G Venniro

customer_reviews.title: New favorite strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: Nice, comfortable strapless bra. Wore it to a wedding and it stayed up very well the whole night. I didn’t have to pull it up once! Definitely my new go to strapless bra.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Livingston

customer_reviews.title: The bra cup fits perfectly but a 36 would have fit better around back to give a comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my size according to the calculations 34D. The bra cup fits perfectly but a 36 would have fit better around back to give a comfortable fit. So for example if you normally wear 34D in designer bras, then for this particular ulnar brand order a 36D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! True to size (for me anyway) And, I love the fact that the strap in the back only has “2” hooks, (Whooo Whooo) verses the normal 5+ (Which makes your shirts look sloppy, because the back is as wide as the front) Ughhh!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than most 30 bands
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought 30DD bras from Calvin Klein before, and they’ve fit perfectly. But this bra was so small that I couldn’t even get it to clasp. For reference, my other 30DD CK bras measure 26” from end to end when lying flat - this one measures 22”. The material quality is great - just might have to try out some different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: I like this bra a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this bra a lot. It's snug because it's strapless but for me that's a good thing, I don't want it slipping down. It's got enough elastic/silicone anti-slip that it stays in place. And I am a 34A and there's no gap in the cup, yay! I've bought a bunch of strapless bras that slide and gap and this one doesn't. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Carter

customer_reviews.title: Wire already sticking out and poking me!
customer_reviews.text: This bra was okay at first, but I haven't had it for more than 2-3 months and the underwire is already poking out and stabbing me! Was not worth the extra money if it's just going to behave like a cheap bra.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: super relieved (:
customer_reviews.text: i was super nervous to get a strapless bra like this because i didn’t want to keep having to pull it up but i wore it out walking for a couple hours and everything was completely fine i had absolutely no issues with it (-: i ordered a 34B just like all my other bras and i didn’t think it was too tight or loose really happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Mason

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Strapless Bra
customer_reviews.text: The best strapless bra I own. I have a bunch of different brands and this is always the one I grab. It stays in place and doesn't show bra lines
customer_reviews.author: Beth Picard

customer_reviews.title: Came without tags and straps
customer_reviews.text: Although I love CK bras as they are comfortable and long lasting, this on3 came without straps and tags. Hopefully, it is new 😊
customer_reviews.author: Nutsa

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my size but these run way small. They Cut into my skin. however, I used a bra extender and was able to use it all day while still supporting my girls. Runs small but was an easy fix with bra extenders.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie_and_David

customer_reviews.title: One of the few basic bras I can find in a 30DD.
customer_reviews.text: I’d been hunting for bras available in size 30DD that were just basic, black and plain for days to accommodate my new size after losing some weight. I finally found this one and ordered it immediately. Tried it on and loved it. It fits nice and snug around me, and holds me in place properly.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, definitely stays in place, my only complaint is it runs small. I wear a 36C in VS bras so that's what I ordered. I should've gotten a 38C.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Boyett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality& color
customer_reviews.text: If there is more than five starts, I do love to give it this item. Perfectly soft and made out of high quality materials. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: hkilvas

customer_reviews.title: Strange fit
customer_reviews.text: The band size fit me normally which is 34. Was unsure what to expect since some people claimed it ran small. My issue is with the cups. If your breasts are not wide spread this is not the bra for you. Fit very odd in the cups.
customer_reviews.author: Al&Darwin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but wash by hand
customer_reviews.text: You'll love the blue electric color. Very soft and easy to care. Perfect cover. Natural lift. I've been wearing this one for at least a year and it keeps its bright color (I wash it by hand). If you do not wash by hand its color fades away in 2 months (this happened to the green one i bought).
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but wash by hand
customer_reviews.text: You'll love the blue electric color. Very soft and easy to care. Perfect cover. Natural lift. I've been wearing this one for at least a year and it keeps its bright color (I wash it by hand). If you do not wash by hand its color fades away in 2 months (this happened to the green one i bought).
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually a 32B and it’s too small. I think one size up would be much better and comfortable. Good quality though
customer_reviews.author: Baby Keeper Mama

customer_reviews.title: Too bad about the rash
customer_reviews.text: As a bra that can be converted to strapless, it has silicon (or something?) on the band to get it to stay in place. The sticky stuff gives me raised welts, even after laundering the bra several times. I haven't had skin sensitivities or reactions to other strapless bras or anything, really. While the fit is as expected and it looks fine, can't recommend due to blistering skin. eew.
customer_reviews.author: Charlee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for halters
customer_reviews.text: Good bra for under tops that are smooth and you don't want to show lines.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Yelvington

customer_reviews.title: Really odd sizing!
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a 34B. After reading reviews about the band being tight I sized up to a 36B. Even the 36B was quite snug around the band, but bearable. The biggest problem was the cups seemed waaay too deep, I didn't come close to "filling" them. Back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT DOES STAY UP!!
customer_reviews.text: This strapless bra was surprisingly a great fit for me. They say these bras run small but when I ordered my size 36D, I had no complaints. Although, I did size up for the band size and it proved to be helpful. The material they put on the inside of the bra does leave a mark and irritates sensitive skin if it’s on for longer then 2/3 hrs+.
customer_reviews.author: Salma Kamel

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing a 36B bra for almost 20 years. I could barely, BARELY, get this one closed in the back. The cup size also seems too small. There is no way it's a 36B. Returning and looking for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item a second time. It runs a bit small so you need to get one size bigger. Overall I like it but during hot climate it would start to bother you.
customer_reviews.author: Isamar Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Ok. No issues with color, fit, or ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok. No issues with color, fit, or purchase; however, bra hook was defective (luckily there are 3 sets) and i need it tok urgently to return.
customer_reviews.author: kerib

customer_reviews.title: Order up a size in the band
customer_reviews.text: Band runs small. I ordered my size originally and had to return and reorder the next size up. The new one fits perfect. I was going to order another color but the price significantly went up so I guess I’ll wait.
customer_reviews.author: TLC1101

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra I own!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to wear throughout the summer and I really like it! It is comfortable enough to wear for a whole day and it stays up! I ordered the same size I wear in regular bras and it fit perfectly! Overall I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great bra, but band runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 36 in most bras but definitely would have preferred a 38 in this one. I can only wear for a few hours before I'm miserable. But it still looks nice and I'll suffer for a date night...
customer_reviews.author: Melina T.

customer_reviews.title: Stay put natural coverage strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: Best strapless bra I’ve used in a long time. Stays in place and provides natural coverage
customer_reviews.author: Ju

customer_reviews.title: I found another Calvin Klein strapless bra that fit much better and was more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: May have gotten the wrong size, but this did not fit well at all. I thought straps were included and they were not. I found another Calvin Klein strapless bra that fit much better and was more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Although I have another Calvin Klein strapless bra that I love and wear all summer long, sadly the latex on this one irrated my back so much it actually created blisters after only wearing it one time.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: My strapless nude bra
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd CK bra. The cinnamon color complements my complexion & looks nude. Ordered it as a strapless bra but it also comes with straps.
customer_reviews.author: The Best Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried so many strapless bras and this one is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped my skin
customer_reviews.text: When I first put this bra on I absolutely loved it. I'm a DD and it was the most supportive bra I've found so far BUT at the end of the day when I took it off I have so many lines where the rubber lining has completely torn my skin. I've never had issues with skin sensitivity but this absolutely killed my back. I'm so disappointed because I wanted to love this bra.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Go buy your bras at the store 🤦🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: This is not 34D at least not the D cup, it fits like a B cup
customer_reviews.author: maryi arriola

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but broke.....
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy strapless bra, fits as normal no need to size up or down.... but where the straps can attach to the bra the loop broke the first time trying it on. But if you just need it as a strapless this is a great bra but I wouldn't rely on it being a convertible bra....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: order a band size up!
customer_reviews.text: great bra, holds up all night and barely had to pull it up. it fits really well but I do suggest ordering a band size up. I usually wear a 32 but the 34 fit me perfectly
customer_reviews.author: BetteC

customer_reviews.title: Solid bra, great for us little ladies.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good, supportive bra that gives a small girl like myself a little “oomph” without being too dramatic. The only thing I don’t love is that the detachable straps and the bra have some anti slip silicone spots along them, which can irritate your skin after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Small busted 36A and it keeps it shape and stays up!! Best strapless bra I own
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with silicone sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and look of this bra. It was comfortable and stayed up. Unfortunately, the no-slip grip gave me itchy red welts along the band line. I guess I'm allergic to the silicone used. Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: mla6603

customer_reviews.title: Didnt fit right.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 36 D didnt fit right or look right
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Buckmaster

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Best Strapless ever! I have 2 Calvin Klein strapless bras and both of them are the best I've ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Best Strapless Bra
customer_reviews.text: This bra stayed up all day long 😊 I did order it a little small by accident so it was kind of digging into my sides by the end of the night but it was so comfortable and the best strapless bra I’ve ever bought before!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan of everything Calvin Klein I'm never disappointed with any purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of everything Calvin Klein I'm never disappointed with any purchase. I initially purchased this bra to wear under a bridesmaids dress. It's comfortable and you can wear it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Woman.Wol

customer_reviews.title: Great but runs small
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great bra even though it runs small, I’m usually a 34B but I had to go up a cup size. For a strapless bra its very comfortable and stays in place nicely.
customer_reviews.author: MORGAN TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Very small band
customer_reviews.text: Man, the band on this bra is very small!!! I usually wear a 32 band but I needed a 36 on this brand/style. I love the look and style tho. It's a great strapless that doesn't squish too much boob on the wrong places.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hugginkiss

customer_reviews.title: Very small band size
customer_reviews.text: Nice material but ordered my normal size with a 30 band. I could not clasp it. I have been measured at 27 inches so just FYI it is super small.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Bronzed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the bronzed color and it is the best strapless bra I’ve ever owned. Soft, doesn’t make your boobs look like a triangle, stays in place. Very good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I am a 36DD and that’s what I bought. Perfect fit all round.
customer_reviews.author: AngeLight

customer_reviews.title: Band is tighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a 32, so that’s what I ordered and it is quite tight in the band. Cups fit perfectly and they’re not awkwardly pointed out like many strapless bras. Good lift and coverage. Overall, had I ordered a 34 instead, I think it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Webber

customer_reviews.title: Use the Calvin Klein chart and the fit will be perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. I got a 34B. I’m 5’4 137lbs. Best strapless bra I’ve ever had. Just took my old one to a charity.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen

customer_reviews.title: Size up!!
customer_reviews.text: This bra has a cute shape but it’s way too small. I went up a size and it still does not fit. I would size up a few sizes in number and letter.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Perky
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra!! I am size 36D and ordered the same size. This bra keeps by babies up and stays in place. Much better than my Victoria Secret strapless bras. No sagging over here.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Women's Naked Glamour Strapless Push Up Bra
product_meta.description: This strapless push up bra features nude tone coloration and a sultry fit.
feature_bullets: Calvin Klein's best-selling strapless bra: Strapless push-up bra with sweetheart cut for all-day, everyday comfortable and functional wear
No-slip grip at interior of sides with boning
Luxurious fabric with hint of shine, small logo plaque at center front
Hook and eye closure with adjustable and removeable straps
Contour underwire cups with slight push up
